title: Cant log onto chat service.
body: Hi guys it's 15th of august I just wanted to know, why can't I log onto chat service I have restarted my client and looked up a few YouTube videos and nothing seems to work. Is it something to do with the servers? because I have seen some YouTube comments and they are saying they cant log on as well please reply :)

replies.body: Hey! I saw your comment because I was looking for information about the same issue... nothing works for me either trying to log onto the chat... ;( This has lasted for 3 days now and I can't seem to fix it.
same with me :/ euw = shat atm

There was a message in the ticker inside the client and on the service status page about this. It seems the issue should be resolved by now, but let me know if you still have issues chatting or inviting friends to games.
